author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MELISSA RE-STRENGTHENING AS IT APPROACHES EASTERN CUBA... ...EXPECTED TO MAKE LANDFALL THERE AS AN EXTREMELY DANGEROUS MAJOR HURRICANE IN THE NEXT FEW HOURS...
summary: ...MELISSA RE-STRENGTHENING AS IT APPROACHES EASTERN CUBA... ...EXPECTED TO MAKE LANDFALL THERE AS AN EXTREMELY DANGEROUS MAJOR HURRICANE IN THE NEXT FEW HOURS... As of 11:00 PM EDT Tue Oct 28 the center of Melissa was located near 19.3, -76.6 with movement NE at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 950 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 130 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...MELISSA RE-STRENGTHENING AS IT APPROACHES EASTERN CUBA... ...EXPECTED TO MAKE LANDFALL THERE AS AN EXTREMELY DANGEROUS MAJOR HURRICANE IN THE NEXT FEW HOURS... title: Summary - Hurricane Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
